phrases: It seems I slightly underrated you, Elfman.
When it comes to tenacity and being able to take punishment,
you just may be number one in our guild.
We will definitely follow the lead of your hard-won victory.
I never thought I would hear Erza dish out praise like that.
She would not if he had not earned it.
You totally gave me the shivers, Elfman!
Cut it out.
You guys sound like you are payin' tribute to a dead man.
Ow...
Well, stubbornness always has been your saving grace.
That is kind of a sad saving grace...
You are not too different!
But it really was amazing, Elfman-san!
It is pathetic, but I cannot do anything laid up like this,
so the rest is up to you, Wendy.
Right!
Well, the next match has already begun.
Get going.
One of the keys to victory is observing the enemy.
Got it, Granny.
See ya later.
I am sorry.
To be honest, I would like to stay here with you...
Forget about it.
Nee-chan's match is up next, remember?
Cheer her on for me.
Relax.
The Raijinshuu will protect him.
My runes will prevent outsiders from entering.
We will not let this place be attacked again.
Sorry...
You could not come up with a better fighting strategy?
Anyway, he is injured and needs his sleep.
How'bout we have Ever sleep with you?
Quit screwin' around!
Still, those Raven Tail jerks play dirty right out in the open...
I wonder if their intention is to take us out one by one.
I have still got my doubts about what happened.
What is it, Carla?
I already heard the basics...
We assume Raven Tail used a guild of bandits
in an attempt to kidnap Lucy.
But thanks to them screwing up the objective and Natsu's pursuit,
the scheme failed twice over.
Does not that make sense?
Although we do not know what they were planning to do with her...
Do not even go there!
The issue is the method of capture.
One of the members of Raven Tail that attacked us
has the power to reduce his opponent's magic power to zero for a moment.
Right...
Master suspects
that he is the one who canceled out Lucy's magic on the first day.
They have got a wizard whose magic would be perfect for a kidnapping,
so why was not he part of the operation?
Well, probably because of the rules of the battle part,
which require all participants to stay close to the arena.
That is because nobody knows who is going to be chosen for battle'til just before, right?
You are overthinking it, Carla.
Yeah.
I know very well that results matter much more to them than means.
Well, either way, if we are being targeted outside of the arena,
we must not let our guards down, and try not to be alone at any time.
What really bothers me
is the question of why they were after Lucy...
Mirajane versus Jenny!
It is the third match of the second day of the Grand Magic Games!
Mirajane Strauss from Fairy Tail B versus
Blue Pegasus reserve member Jenny Rearlight!
I am back.
How is Elfman doing?
He is all beat up, but no worries.
So it is a showdown between two former models, huh?
Jenny's incredibly popular.
I seem to recall that seven years ago,
she was voted the Number One Wizard I Want to Be My Girlfriend in Weekly Sorcerer.
I remember reading she really looked up to Mira-nee as a role model and aimed to be like her.
But Mira-nee was asleep for seven years,
so I guess Jenny is the older one now...
Have you recovered?
Carla!
Wendy's okay now, too.
I was told that everyone but the participants have to stay in these seats.
I was so worried about you!
Never mind that.
The match has already started, right?
There is no sense being hung up on my dream now.
I have got to cheer our guild on!
Mirajane!
Do your best!
Uh...
What is this?!
They are...
Master, calm down.
Like this?
How is this?
What the hell's going on here?!
Mira-san...
I guess... since they are both former pinup models...
This is despicable.
Like so?
Hi...
They do this kind of thing in the battle part too?
I imagine this involves a special rule...
Or at least, I hope so...
Who would have figured we would have to dip into our reserves on the second day...
Could not be helped.
Not with Ichiya-san like that...
A competition that relied on physical strength must have really been tough on him.
As expected, pretty impressive.
It is been a while since I have done this kind of thing.
I did not think you would agree to do a pinup idol showdown.
Yeah, well, I am not too fond of slugfests.
If we can resolve this peacefully, all the better, right?
Two former pinup idols!
And both of them using Transformation Magic, making this a dream battle come true!
I am Chapati Rola, a judge along with Yajima-san,
and reporter Jason of the Weekly Sorcerer!
It is a big responsibility.
Both of them are cool beauties!
What is the next swimsuit going to be...
Hold it!
It will not do to let these little girls get all the attention!
When it comes to strength as well as beauty...
Why do I have to be out here?
This is an unforeseen happening!
Mermaid
Heel has crashed the battle!
And I am happy to see that Risley is slender for the moment!
Stop right there!
You people do not have enough love!
If you think you can please the crowd just by posing in swimsuits, you are gravely mistaken!
It is all about love!
Without love...
And now Sherry and Cheria from Lamia Scale have joined the party!
I am in awe of all of them...
This is no time to just sit back and be impressed!
Do not tell me...
But I did not bring a swimsuit...
Do not worry!
I anticipated that
so I came prepared with enough swimsuits for everybody!
You think of everything, First Master!
Your keen insight dwarfs our imaginations!
Is not it more like she just came ready to have a good time?
You three cannot just sit back and watch either!
Let us all join in!
Why?!
When other people from the cheering section take the field, doing nothing is not an option!
Swimsuits look best
on Juvia, the water-manipulating wizard!
What, you are going out there too?
A woman in love has to battle at a time like this.
I am sick of hearin' about it...
I think this has gotten out of hand...
Well, it is not so bad as a fun little stunt...
It is chaos here!
And yet, the crowd is eating it up, so we will go with it!
Not to mention we would have a riot on our hands if we put a stop to the fun now!
This is great!
So cool!
It is settled!
The next Weekly Sorcerer cover story will be a wizard swimsuit competition!
Still and all,
this match is just between Mirajane and Jenny!
In that case, there is no point in us being out here!
Oh, the main thing is that we have fun!
How is it that a ghost like you gets such a kick out of this?
I bet anything her personality
has an effect on the mood of our guild!
What, you are here too?
I will not let your people hog the spotlight.
The next theme is school swimsuits!
Why are we suddenly in weird fetish swimwear?
You do not really look out of place in one, Wendy.
That does not make me happy!
Next up is bikinis and thigh-high socks!
For some reason, this feels even more embarrassing than the swimsuit alone...
Moving on to girls in glasses!
This is not any change for me...
Cat ears!
Is there any point for me to wear them?
Bondage!
This is also a form of love!
You are too into it!
Well, Erza?
Are you about ready to admit defeat?
Did you say something?
I lose...
We are gettin' further and further into fetish territory!
Yeah...
I do not mind...
The next theme is wedding dress!
Prepare a partner, then get into bridal gear!
I am sorry for suddenly dragging you into this, Master.
This is all part of the job of being master...
Well, you were at hand...
That is actually even more of a turn-on...
I am Levy's groom!
She already rejected you!
It is the same with you!
You are not paired up with anyone?
This is ridiculous.
I am better off just taking a nap.
You guys are not going out there?
No.
If something should happen...
If my wife happened to see me...
I am the groom for you, right, Carla?
Well, since we are both Exceeds...
Juvia!
I am the only one for you...
Leon-sama!
But Juvia is...
Gray-sama!
It is no fun letting a teammate get snatched by a jerk from another guild.
Juvia is so happy!
Our love is steadfast!
Do not be so clingy!
You will make me fall in love with you even more...
Who should I...?
Loke!
Let us take this opportunity
and really get married!
Natsu!
You look good in that!
You too, Natsu!
When did this...?!
Come to think of it, when we were kids, I imagined that we would get...
Lucy, what are you doing?!
I am sorry!
Hurry up and get offa me...
The wedding showdown is over!
Let us go back to the swimsuit showdown!
I think it is about time for me to put in an appearance!
That is...
Lamia Scale's Oba Babasama
is going to show you
what a woman's charm is!
With that single strike, the excitement in this arena went down the drain.
The interlopers suddenly lost interest and are returning to their seats.
Cool down...
It looks like playtime is over, huh?
I am a little disappointed.
That was fun...
This match has gone on much longer than planned, so the next outfit will be the last!
Here it is!
With apologies to Mira, no matter what the theme is,
I have got a trick that guarantees my victory!
Mira, this will be the last one.
Yep.
And I am not going to lose!
Why do not we go with the flow of the previous matches
and make a bet?
Good idea.
What are the stakes?
How about the person who loses
has to appear nude in the Weekly Sorcerer?!
Mira-nee...
For a second, I thought it would not be bad if she lost...
I am sorry.
Me too...
Sure, why not?!
O-O-Oh my goodness!
An unbelievable wager has just been made!
She fell for it.
Between me and Mira,
I do not know which of us has more fans out of the people in the stands,
but the key point is those three judges.
Cool-cool-cool-cool-cool!
I coincidentally asked about their type of women during last night's dinner party,
and it seems their preference is for younger women!
Mira has not aged for seven years.
Which means she is young!
And Jason,
I am sure you will choose Mira to sell more magazines.
After all, a beautiful model comes back after seven years without aging and she is nude!
There is nothing to even think about.
T-The final theme... is battle gear!
I am sorry, Mira.
Whatever the theme, I will win.
Just as I planned...
This is my battle form.
Then I will change into mine.
We went with the flow of previous matches and made a bet
so maybe it will be okay
to keep going with that flow and finish this with a little dust-up?
What is that form?!
Mirajane's demonic Sitri form.
From what I know, it is her strongest Satan Soul.
I accepted your bet.
Now I want you to accept my power.
What?!
Okay?
A complete change!
In the end, we got a physical fight!
Well, that is the original rule...
Cool!
Cool!
Cool!
The winner...
Mirajane!
She did it!
That is my Mira-nee!
She did it!
She did it!
She did it!
She did it!
She did it!
She did it!
No matter which won...
We got to buy the Sorcerer!
That is like the old Mira!
Awesome!
I thought this was supposed to be a pinup model battle...
It was a pinup model battle.
But I do not think there was any no punching rule.
I am trying to wrap my head around that one...
Is not that how she always is?
Sorry!
I look forward to seeing you in your birthday suit, Jenny.
No!!
Fairy Tail B receives ten points!
That was incredible.
Get it?
She is not someone you want to piss off.
Understood.
Congratulations, Mira-san.
I feel like I wore a lot of immodest outfits.
Although that last one had the most impact...
So now we have 12 points, the same as Natsu's team.
What is wrong, Mystogan?
Nothing...
Is not he supposed to be the silent type?
Oh, that is right...
Even though the second day is about to be over...
What does this mean?
Captain Arcadios!
Well, well, Defense Minister Darton...
What do you think you are doing?!
Doing about what?
Do not feign ignorance!
Why are you trying to get a hold of a Celestial Spirit Wizard now?!
Do not you think it is premature?
I want to make a trial run as soon as possible.
It is still too early!
It is not ready yet!
Defense Minister,
please keep your voice down.
Besides, it is indeed complete.
What?!
Saying it was not ready was a lie of convenience, in order to come up with a budget.
Now all we need is a Celestial Spirit Wizard
and Eclipse will have reached the practical stage.
I do not believe it...
You are telling me it is been completed in merely seven years?!
The project shall now proceed to phase 4, plan B.
This time we will absolutely acquire a Celestial Spirit Wizard.
It is already common knowledge that you are opposed to the Eclipse Project.
However, we cannot be stopped now after coming this far.
Are you a devil?!
For the sake of king and country,
a man may even become devil or god.
Weighed against Eclipse, the gateway that will change the world,
the life of one girl is exceedingly cheap.
Alright, the second day of the Grand Magic Games reaches its final match at last!
Kagura Mikazuchi from Mermaid Heel versus
Sabertooth's Yukino Agria!
We have got another battle of the beauties!
Which do you think is going to win?
Yukino-san, of course!
How is it you do not even know that, Frosch?!
Fro thinks so, too!
Thanks to somebody, we could not get any points in the competition part.
No.
Sting-sama was just unlucky.
If we would known the competition was going to be on top of a moving vehicle...
Never mind about that.
You do know what it means to be a member of this team, do not you?
Sabertooth...
It means fighting in that name without sullying it
and winning without question.
Good luck, Kagura-chan!
Win it for me!
Still, her opponent's from Sabertooth...
Kagura is stronger than her!
Never fear.
I saw the path...
The destination of my sword...
I guess we are done with the pinup model battles?
Well, depending on individual taste, it would not be out of the question...
We could not ask this cool twosome to do that, right?!
Sabertooth...
Watch closely.
This is the guild we have to overcome.
Right!
All of you already know how strong Kagura is.
She is Mermaid Heel's strongest wizard
as well as the Weekly Sorcerer's top pick for female wizard!
Against her is Yukino, who is making her debut today.
Still, she is a member of the strongest guild, Sabertooth,
so we can expect her to be pretty strong!
Alright, let the match begin!
I look forward to doing battle with you.
As do I.
Before we begin, shall we make a bet too?
Sorry, but I am not interested.
Is it because you are afraid of losing?
I do not possess that kind of emotion.
However, I believe that when one makes a wager, it must be followed through.
So I would like to abstain from any thoughtless diversions.
In that case, let us make a serious bet.
Let us bet our lives.
The next battle is also between two women, huh?
Is it going to be another swimsuit showdown?
If it is, the sponsor of this tournament who decides on the match-ups
has a dirty mind!
But it does not feel like that is going to be the case this time...
Both of them seem like they are straight-laced, right?
It looks like this is going to be a serious match.
In other words, we are not getting any more so-called service scenes, huh?
Next time: Kagura versus Yukino!
She said they are going to bet their lives, but what happens when one loses?
They go nude in the Sorcerer!
That was for the last match!
